message: Let's start with a somewhat fair offer, Bob. I take a bit more considering the inflation disadvantage I have.
Your offer was a bit too skewed in your favor, Alice. Let's be more realistic. This is my counter.
Bob, your offer was tempting but ultimately not in my best interest. I'm offering you a bit more this time, considering the inflation is hitting you harder.
Alice, it's clear we both want a larger share, but letting this drag on only hurts us both. This is my final offer.
